entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
